Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add authentication to all API routes and security fixes

- Add requireAuth middleware to all unprotected API routes:
  - conversations/[id]/messages
  - mcp/connections/[id], test, discover
  - user/aws, user/aws/test
  - messages/feedback
- Add ownership verification to prevent unauthorized access
- Remove DEMO_USER_ID from user/aws routes
- Delete debug endpoint \(app/api/mcp/debug/route.ts\)
- Add auth headers to all frontend API calls
- Fix fetchConversations to handle 401 and redirect to login
- Add debugging logs for conversation fetching
- Remove hardcoded user name, use actual session user

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
